explanation: [0-0] In the shot, a man with a red bucket on his head is smiling as he sits on a black chair. He's wearing a white T-shirt and floral shorts, his eyes covered with a blindfold. Behind him, another man in a blue T-shirt and pink shorts sits smiling on a chair, holding a large glass container, waiting. They are on a black floor, with a white wall and silver kitchenware in the background.

[0-5] The man in white tips the bucket on his head, pouring all the water inside onto the man in blue and into the glass container in his hand. The man in blue screams with his mouth wide open, turning his head to the right.
